wikitext.*:
'''Lord of the Eagles''' was a title of two [[Eagles]]: the [[Great Eagle]]<ref>{{H|6}}</ref> and [[Thorondor]]<ref>{{UT|15}}</ref><ref>{{FG|List}}</ref>.

The Great Eagle was also known as the '''lord of the eagles of the [[Misty Mountains]]'''<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=H 06.067}}</ref> and the '''lord of the eagles'''.<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=H 07.002}}</ref> Thorondor was also known as the '''King of Eagles'''<ref>{{GA|149}}</ref><ref>{{LR|Quenta}}, §96</ref><ref>{{LR|AB}}</ref><ref>{{LR|A2}}, entry "''Cristhorn''"</ref><ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entries "TĀ-, TAȜ-" and "THOR-, THORON-"</ref> or the '''king of eagles'''<ref>{{WJ|Ruin}}, §147</ref><ref>{{LR|Quenta}}, ''Of the Ruin of Beleriand'', §153</ref>. He was also called the '''Lord of Eagles'''.<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=S QS.23.008}}</ref>

While [[Gwaihir]] was never called the Lord of the Eagles directly, his name was often translated as the Windlord.<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=LR 2.02.179}}</ref><ref name=":0">{{Cite DTP|id=LR 6.04.003}}</ref> It is possible that Gwaihir and his brother [[Landroval]] were two of the Great Eagle's fifteen chieftains<ref>{{H|Queer}}</ref>, since all the other Eagles were called their vassals.<ref name=":0" />

== Other versions of the legendarium ==
In an early draft of the chapter "[[Out of the Frying-Pan into the Fire]]", the Great Eagle is referred to as "the '''lord of eagles'''" and "the '''[[Lord of Eagles]]'''".<ref>{{HH|VI}}</ref> In an early draft of the chapter "[[Queer Lodgings]]", the Great Eagle's title was changed to the [[Lord of the Eagles]] and he was given the title '''king of all Birds'''.<ref>{{HH|VII}}</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
'''1980: [[Der Hobbit (1980 German radio series)|''Der Hobbit'' (1980 German radio series)]]:'''
:The Lord of the Eagles is played by Friedrich W. Bauschulle.

'''2011: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'':'''
:[[Gwaihir]] bears the title "Lord of the Eagles".<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]], Chapter 1: Fornost, ''Citadel Tower''</ref>

'''2012: ''[[Lego|LEGO The Hobbit]]'':'''
:Gwaihir is conflated with the Lord of the Eagles.
